description: She is a university student who lives in the same building as Shinkuro. She can be described as a very flirtatious person, especially towards Shinkuro. She says she is very knowledgeable in the ways of love but doesn`t include her own experiences as she has a hard time keeping a boyfriend. She tends to voluntarily watch Murasaki during the day while Shinkuro is at school.
name: Mutou Tamaki
